game.name: USFIV: Complete Challengers 2 Pack (2011)
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: All alternate costumes for Juri, Ibuki, Cody, Adon and T.Hawk are included in this pack. Create a new legend with these crazy costumes!
game.shortDescriptionEn: All alternate costumes for Juri, Ibuki, Cody, Adon and T.Hawk are included in this pack. Create a new legend with these crazy costumes!
